name: Notion Automations for Newbies (NAFN)
description: Are you tired of spending hours on repetitive tasks in Notion? Do you wish there was an easier way to automate your work and increase your productivity? Look no further than Notion Automations for newbies (NAFN), created by bardeen.ai & NotionpunkWith NAFN, you'll gain access to more than 50+ automations that can be implemented in your Notion workspace. Say goodbye to tedious manual work and hello to more free time to focus on what really matters.But that's not all - NAFN also includes 10+ t
